org.jpws.pwslib.data

Class RawFieldList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.pwslib.data.RawFieldList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeaderFieldList

    public class RawFieldList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    RawFieldList implements a sorted map from field names (0..255) into type PwsRawField. Field names function as the "field types" as the assumption on each rawfield list is that any field type may occur only once.

    Fields returned by this list are a deep clone of the listed fields.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RawFieldList() 
      RawFieldList(RawFieldList list)
      Creates a raw field list with initial content identical to the parameter raw field list.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Returns a shallow copy if this rawfield list. (Elements of the list are not cloned!)
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • getField

        public PwsRawField getField(int type)
        Returns a field of the given type (=name) from this field list. (The returned field is a deep copy of the listed field.)
        Parameters:
        type - the requested field type (0..255)
        Returns:
        PwsRawField if the field was found, or null otherwise

      • setField

        public PwsRawField setField(PwsRawField field)
        Sets the content of a field. If the field was already present in this list, the previous content is replaced; otherwise a new field is inserted.
        Parameters:
        field - PwsRawField the new field/content
        Returns:
        PwsRawField the previous value of this field if it was defined before, null otherwise

      • removeField

        public PwsRawField removeField(int type)
        Removes a field of the given type from this list. Returns the field that was removed or null if no such field was present.
        Parameters:
        type - the field id
        Returns:
        PwsRawField

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<PwsRawField> iterator()
        Iterator over all fields of this list (in ascending sorted order).
        Returns:
        Iterator of element type PwsRawField

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the current number of fields in this list.
        Returns:
        int list size

      • dataSize

        public long dataSize(int format)
        Returns the size of the data block required to store the content of this field list on a persistent state. (This takes into respect the general file formating rules of a PWS file.)
        Parameters:
        format - int the file format version of the persistent state
        Returns:
        long required (blocked) data space

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all entries from this list.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int type)
        Whether this list contains a field of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - int field name

      • getStringValue

        public java.lang.String getStringValue(int type)
        Returns a string value interpretation (UTF-8) of a specified element of this list. If field or field value value are missing, an empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - field ID
        Returns:
        String field value as text
